name: Editor for Chrome Save Button Switch
description: If you're bouncing back and forth between the editor and the site you're styling, I find it useful for the save button to more definitively reflect a successful save.
additional_info:
When all edits have been saved the button text appears as "Saved". When any edits have been made and not yet saved, the button text appears as "Save?".

If you'd also prefer a dark interface, check out my other style: https://userstyles.org/styles/113469/stylish-chrome-editor-inverted-dark

Update 2/1/17 - Stylus compatibility.
